get.summary: Read all property validation rules for an object
get.description: Read all properties with validation rules for a given object.

parameters.name: objectTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the object type for which all property validation rules are being retrieved.

get.summary: Read validation rules for a property
get.description: Read a property's validation rules identified by {propertyName}.

parameters.name: objectTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the object type to which the property belongs.

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: The name of the property whose validation rules are being retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve a validation rule for a specific property and rule type, providing details on how property values should be formatted.
get.description: Retrieve a specific validation rule for a property identified by its name and rule type.

parameters.name: objectTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the object type to which the property belongs.

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: The name of the property for which the validation rule is being retrieved.

parameters.name: ruleType
parameters.description: The type of validation rule being retrieved, such as FORMAT, ALPHANUMERIC, or MAX_LENGTH.

put.summary: Update a validation rule for a specific property and rule type, allowing customization of property value constraints.
put.description: Update a specific validation rule for a property identified by its name and rule type.

parameters.name: objectTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the object type to which the property belongs.

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: The name of the property for which the validation rule is being updated.

parameters.name: ruleType
parameters.description: The type of validation rule being updated, such as FORMAT, ALPHANUMERIC, or MAX_LENGTH.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

propertyName.description: The name of the property for which validation rules are defined.

propertyValidationRules.description: A list of validation rules applicable to the property.

ruleArguments.description: A list of arguments that define the constraints for the validation rule.

results.description: Collection of validation rules configured for the specified property. Each rule defines a constraint that property values must satisfy (e.g., format requirements, length limits, allowed values).

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

results.description: Collection of properties with their validation rules. Each item maps a property name to its configured validation rules for the specified object type.

ruleArguments.description: A list of arguments that define the specific conditions or parameters for the validation rule.

ruleType.description: The category of validation applied to the property, such as FORMAT, ALPHANUMERIC, or MAX_LENGTH.

scopes.automation: Read from and write to my Workflows
scopes.crm.objects.companies.sensitive.read.v2: View sensitive properties on company records
scopes.crm.objects.companies.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on company records
scopes.crm.objects.contacts.sensitive.read.v2: View sensitive properties on contact records
scopes.crm.objects.contacts.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on contact records
scopes.crm.objects.deals.sensitive.read.v2: View sensitive properties on deal records
scopes.crm.objects.deals.sensitive.write.v2: Create or update sensitive properties on deal records
scopes.crm.pipelines.orders.read: View details about your cart pipelines including pipeline stage information
scopes.crm.pipelines.orders.write: Create, delete, or make to your order pipelines or their respective stages
scopes.crm.schemas.companies.write: Create new company properties or change company property settings
scopes.crm.schemas.contacts.write: Create new contact properties or change contact property settings
scopes.crm.schemas.deals.write: Create new deal properties or change deal property settings
